com.dev.challenge.worker

Class AllPagesScrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.dev.challenge.worker.AllPagesScrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    @Component
public class AllPagesScrapper
extends java.lang.Thread
    Thread goes by pages like http://brovary-rada.gov.ua/documents/?start=i i=0, 10, 20 ..., scrap links on documents, and start new PagesScrapper thread by every 10 links, until. Every 1000 Documents saving in DB
